```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE
)

ggplot2::theme_set(hrbrthemes::theme_ipsum_pub())

options("scipen"=100, "digits"=4)
```

```{r, cache=TRUE}
library(tidytuesdayR)

tuesdata <- tt_load(2020, week = 6)
```

```{r duration, fig.width=15, fig.height=10}
library(tidyverse)

tuesdata$attendance %>%
  left_join(tuesdata$standings, by = c("year", "team_name", "team")) %>%
  mutate(team = paste(team, team_name)) %>%
  filter(year==2003) %>%
  ggplot(aes(week, weekly_attendance)) +
  geom_step() +
  geom_smooth() +
  facet_wrap(~team)
```
